name: Acemcee
overview:
ACEMCEE (www.acemcee.com) is an innovative company operating internationally in the domains of professional event management, online event steering, and developing solutions for modern mobile platforms. The company was established in 2010; its founders have been involved in event management since 1993.

The company focuses on its leading product Takeplace (www.takeplace.eu) — the next-generation web service for steering events online, offering rich functionality that covers event management workflow from A to Z, promoting efficient team work and building an expert community network of event organizers and participants. Takeplace holistically brings together efficiency, collaboration and social and educational networking.

In 2010 Acemcee won the second place at the Idea of the Year business competition as a company with high innovative potential. In the same year the company gained support from the South Moravian Innovation Centre and entered the prestigious Technological Incubator in the Czech Technology Park in Brno. In 2012 we were finalists at Seedcamp Zagreb and in October 2012 Takeplace became TOP8 startup finalist at Qualcomm Venture Prize – QPrize – from Eastern Europe.

Among the company’s strategic customers are universities, training companies, consulting houses and trade fairs.

Specialties event management, online event steering, rich web applications, mobile platforms
